content: {"name": "Mt. Zion AME Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Face Masks Are REQUIRED (participants must bring their own)\n* ID with current address is required for the person registering and for anyone residing in the household. This allows us to provide sufficient amount of food. (Everyone's address must have the address of the person registering).\n* The participant is able to attend the food pantry once per month. An email will go out inviting participants to come back for an additional food pantry bag if food item supplies allow it. ", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1765 Madison Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10029", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.799702, "longitude": -73.9447607}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 369-6643", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required for all members of the household"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
